summary: .dds texture files you can use to create your own loading screens and/or main menu replacers.
descriptionHtml:
Hello all.

I've recently done a massive overhaul of my most recent mod, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73151/?]NCLS - Nexus Community Loading Screens[/url] which replaces Vanilla loading screens with artwork/screenshots provided by Nexus users.

I thought I'd share these templates to give people the means to more directly control the loading screens they might want, or perhaps to even make their own mod with it.  (This file isn't a mod per se, but rather a resource to be used by people who might want to include their own artwork to be used in main menu replacers or loading screen replacers.)

Included are three (empty) .dds templates... Do with them what you will :)  And of course, if you're curious, go check out my mod and send me your pictures!  (link above)

Cheers!
author: Dahveed
